alert.note: Alert for East Slopes of the Oregon Cascades (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 28 at 5:43AM PST until December 28 at 1:00PM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON ABOVE 3500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow above 3500 feet. Additional snow accumulations of up to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph will cause blowing and drifting of snow. * WHERE...East Slopes of the Oregon Cascades. * WHEN...Until 1 PM PST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1, or by visiting online at https://tripcheck.com for Oregon or https://wsdot.com/travel for Washington.

area.areaDesc: East Slopes of the Oregon Cascades
